td.content: s:pt presents with Neurological for about 2 days. pt is a white male sail maker aged 38 years. denies any smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 5 years in his past o:Height 187 cm, Weight 52.6 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, B burgdorferi IgG Serum positive a:Paralysis p:administered Immune globulin - 400 mg/kg IV daily x 5 days, performed B burgdorferi IgG Serum, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
